feat: Implement Phase I in-memory todo CLI

This commit introduces the complete initial implementation of the
in-memory command-line todo application.

Key features include:
- A modular structure with separation of concerns \(models, engine, main\).
- Core CRUD functionality: add, view, complete, and delete tasks.
- A simple REPL interface for user interaction.
- All project setup, specification, planning, and task files.

This work corresponds to Phase I of the project, establishing the foundational codebase for future enhancements.
